title: Pupil absence in schools in England [Year]
description: This release reports on pupil absence in primary and secondary schools in the x to x academic year.
datasetNotes: On the  landing page  click on full year release and click on the latest release, this will open a new tab the data can be found under docments as a XLS, ODS  or CSV in a zip file
sizingNotes: Messy table structure, with a mixture of  % and numbers with footnotes
